fn.p: Supplemental material for this article may be found at https://doi.org/10.1128/JCM.00179-17.

[ This article was published on 23 May 2017 with a standard copyright line (“© 2017 American Society for Microbiology. All Rights Reserved.”). The authors elected to pay for open access for the article after publication, necessitating replacement of the original copyright line with the one above, and this change was made on 24 July 2017. The authors intend to publish an Author Correction announcing this change in the October 2017 issue of the Journal of Clinical Microbiology.]
